column3: 2015) view/ create memorial website send sympathy card david earl hausinger
column5: passed away at his home with his wife and daughters by his side on wednesday
column9: a son of the late norbert and verona (budde) hausinger. he married his high school sweetheart cassandra (floeter) hausinger on september 12
column10: 1964 at st. paul's lutheran church in manchester. dave was a lifetime member of st. john's lutheran church
column11: salemville and served on the church council. he worked for 32 years at del monte in markesan and retired at the age of 55. he also had a small hobby farm and raised hogs. dave enjoyed bowling
column14: gardening and golfing. he and sandy took joy in spending time with their grandchildren and watching them participate in all of their sports and activities. he loved vacationing with his family every summer and traveling to college hockey's frozen four. he also enjoyed doing fieldwork for muehlenhaupt farms
column15: especially the corn harvest. dave is survived by his wife of 50 years
column18: mo and vicky (dan) zacharias of delavan
column21: sam and nicholas haight; payton and carter zacharias; an aunt
column26: greg (shannon) hausinger and maxine (bill) trotz; 3 brothers-in-law
column28: jeff (sandy) floeter and joe (pam) floeter; 3 sisters-in-law
column30: carla (mike) wendt and diane lemiesz; nieces
column32: other relatives and many friends. he is preceded in death by an infant daughter
column33: jody hausinger; his parents; his in-laws
column34: arden and helen floeter; an aunt
column37: brittany quade. funeral services for dave will be held on monday
column39: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. at st. john's lutheran church
column42: with pastor frank rose officiating. burial will follow at salemville cemetery. visitation will be held on sunday
column44: 2015 from 4:00 to 8:00 p. m. at markesan community funeral home
column48: 2015 from 10:00 a. m. until the hour of service at church. a memorial fund has been established in dave's name. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2012 - 2015 community funeral homes funeral home website by batesville
